const response = await client.search({
  body: {
    aggs: {
      JapaneseCars: {
        terms: {
          field: 'make',
          include: [
            'mazda',
            'honda'
          ]
        }
      },
      ActiveCarManufacturers: {
        terms: {
          field: 'make',
          exclude: [
            'rover',
            'jensen'
          ]
        }
      }
    }
  }
})
console.log(response)
